props.caption: Set the caption
props.expanded: con used for expand toggle button.
props.fixedHeader: Fixed header to top of table. **NOTE**: Does not work in IE11
props.footerProps: See the [MDataIterator](/blazor/components/data-iterators/api/MDataFooter) API for more information
props.groupBy: Changed which project property should be used when grouping projects. Currently only a single packet format is supported.
props.groupDesc: Changes which direction grouping is done.
props.headerProps: Pass props to the default header. See [MDataTableHeader](/blazor/components/data-tables/api/MDataTableHeader) for more information
props.headers: An array of objects that each describe a header column. See the example below for a definition of all properties
props.headersLength: Can be used in combination with `HideDefaultFooter` to specify the number of columns in the table to allow expansion rows and loading bar to function properly
props.itemClass: Property on supplied `Items` that contains item's row class or function that takes an item as an argument and returns the class of corresponding row
props.itemKey: The field on each item object that designates a unique key. The value of this property has to be unique for each item.
props.items: The array of items to display
props.itemsPerPage: Changes how many items per page should be visible.
props.loaderHeight: Specifies the height of the loader
props.loading: If true and no items are provided, then a loading text will be shown
props.loadingText: Text shown when `Loading` is true and no items are provided
props.locale: Sets the locale of component. Used for translating internal text strings.
props.mobileBreakpoint: Sets the locale of component. Used for translating internal text strings.
props.multiSort: If `true` then one can sort on multiple properties
props.mustSort: If `true` then one can not disable sorting, it will always switch between ascending and descending
props.noDataText: Text shown when no items are provided to the component
props.noResultsText: Text shown when `Search` prop is used and there are no results
props.page: Changes which page of items is displayed.
props.search: Text input used to filter items
props.selectableKey: The property on each item that is used to determine if it is selectable or not
props.serverItemsLength: The property on each item that is used to determine if it is selectable or not
props.showExpand: Shows the expand toggle in default rows
props.showGroupBy: Shows the group by toggle in the header and enables grouped rows
props.showSelect: Shows the select checkboxes in both the header and rows (if using default rows)
props.singleExpand: Changes expansion mode to single expand
props.singleSelect: Changes selection mode to single select
props.sortBy: Changes which item property (or properties) should be used for sort order.
props.sortDesc: Changes which direction sorting is done.

contents.bodyAppendContent: Slot to replace the default table <tbody>
contents.bodyPrependContent: Prepends elements to the start of the default table <tbody>
contents.footContent: Slot to add a custom footer
contents.footerContent: Slot to add a custom footer
contents.groupContent: Slot to replace the default rendering of grouped rows
contents.groupHeaderContent: Slot to customize the default rendering of group headers
contents.itemContent: Slot to replace the default rendering of a row
contents.itemDataTableExpandContent: Slot to replace the default [MIcon](/blazor/components/icons) used when expanding rows
contents.itemDataTableSelectContent: Slot to replace the default [MSimpleCheckbox](/blazor/components/data-tables/api/MSimpleCheckbox) used when selecting rows
contents.loadingContent: Defines content for when `Loading` is true and no items are provided
contents.noDataContent: Defines content for when no items are provided
contents.noResultsContent: Defines content for when search is provided but no results are found
contents.progressContent: Slot to replace the default [MProgressLinear](/blazor/components/progress-linear) component
contents.topContent: Slot to add content above the table
